statements.query: MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(s:CloudFrontDistribution) WHERE s.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH s LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (s)
MATCH (:CloudFrontDistribution)-[r:HAS_ORIGIN]->(s:CloudFrontDistributionOrigin) WHERE s.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH s LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (s)
